title: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
notes: Extremely slow loading. First level took 30 minutes to load on an HDD. Crashed when I attempted to change resolution to 4k

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Loading times are significantly improved if you disable Shader Preload in the Graphics settings. However, this will incur significant stuttering during gameplay until all the shaders have been cached. The stuttering makes the game almost unplayable. When the game isn't stuttering, it performs admirably. I get around 80-100 FPS on my Vega 64.
title: Call of Duty®: Advanced Warfare - Gold Edition
